page.title: 18My Life in 1985
page.content: My name is Tim. I live in Selsea cottage in Grampound.I go to Grampound with Creed primary school.I am a seven years old school boy.I have Weetabix for breakfast.I have cheese,pickle and peanut butter for lunch.I am a first year.My bedroom has got blue walls.I go to school every week.I get money to buy sweets on Saturdays sometimes.On Sunday we go to church but not always. Daddy has just built a new back end to our house.I have got a sister and a new baby brother.My sister's name is Donna she is 5.My brother is called Tom he is 9 weeks old.I have a friend called Pip I go to play with him. I go to piano lessons on Mondays at 4.30.I am learning Break Dancing at a class on Saturday mornings.I have a cat called Sam and two lodger cats called Daisy and Rosie.I also have two guinea pigs.
